sentences.en: How are you ? This is Dr. Bailey and these are my fellow interns.
sentences.cn: 那个家伙太会自作主张多管事,任何人都会以为他是经理.

sentences.en: Through this program around ten interns join in Cegos Group the worldwide each year.
sentences.cn: 企顾司每年在全球有数十名人才通过这一项目加入公司,为其职业发展奠定了坚实的基础.

trans.tran_cn: <美>住院实习医生( intern的名词复数 )
trans.tran_en: An intern is an advanced student or a recent graduate, especially in medicine, who is being given practical training under supervision

trans.tran_cn: 拘留，关押( intern的第三人称单数 )
